attributes.action: treat Global Warming as the major threat to our civilisation that it is and adjust all government policy in the light of this.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unless the worlds governments start to take major actions to deal with Global Warming both to reduce carbon emmisions that are causing it and to prepare for the effects that are already starting to happen, we are heading for an environmental catastrophe that threatens our very civilisation.  I urge the government to act on all fronts, both at home and abroad and to ask of any policy or proposed legislation. "How does this affect our future with regard to this life threatening issue."
